name: Glowstorm
description:
A local multiplayer pvp game where you try to shoot your opponents before they shoot you. Supports up to six players. Using multiple keyboards with different keybindings may be advantageous. 

Chrome browser is highly recommended for running this game.

This is my first game and it is made using JavaScript and HTML 5 canvas element only.

GitHub: https://github.com/Nezio/Glowstorm

Tips:

Use power-ups to your advantage. Power-ups with a circle icon are 'permanent' upgrades in that round and the ones with square icon last for a couple of seconds.
